testcase.name: Update assemblyById
testcase.system-out: * url assemblyServiceBaseUrl .............................................. passed * def assembliesEndpoint = '/v1/assemblies' ............................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * def createAssemblyScenario = callonce read('classpath:com/gabrielspassos/poc/assembly/assembly.feature@CreateAssembly') . passed * def assemblyId = createAssemblyScenario.response.id ..................... passed Given path assembliesEndpoint, assemblyId ................................. passed And request '{"expirationDateTime":null,"newStatus":"OPEN"}' .............. passed When method PATCH ......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And assert assemblyId == response.id ...................................... passed And match response == ..................................................... passed
